intro_only_event_multi_champion_battle_c:
A special Champion Stadium is happening 
right now!

And the final opponent in that Champion
Stadium is...

Now that I’ve become a Neo Champion, I can use
you for my trainin’!

I’d be happy if you challenged
me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Besides, if I’m not good enough to beat you...

that means I definitely can’t go sayin’ I’m a
Neo Champion!
